title: thinking of leaving NA
body: NA is notoriously a horrible soloq experience wondering if it would be more fun to play on OCE if the ping is right

replies.body: At a silver level your probably sitting at about the same sort of experience, fact is lower elo tend to have a lot of assholes.

Well we have a lot more technical issues then other servers (to be expected for a smaller server).

The amount of assholes are around the same level in the lower elo's, i think there might be more compared to NA in the higher levels of play (ratio to size sort of way)

Honestly it's a matter of if your ping is better or not, i mean all the twelvie sounding kids tend to complain on the boards for things that just don't exist half the time.

OCE really isn't as bad as many people tend to make out. People piss and moan about trolls in ranked but that happens on every server. It's more to do with the level of skill you play at as opposed to there being more toxicity.

I played NA for 2 years then switched to OCE for better ping. 
NA is so much better.
oce is great, I'm always meeting fellow trolls, being told to git gud, 'ez game' it's where you come if you want to expand your knowledge of dankest memes.
OCE is the worst! do not go there!
oceania is worse than na dont move till the issues are resolved
